alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 28 at 11:45AM MST until December 28 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Central Highlands, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, Far Northeast Highlands, Northeast Highlands, and Eastern Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern Lincoln County; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
